import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./Today.css" import history from '../../Assets/history.png' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import { addTask } from '../../Redux/userSlice' const color = [ {back:"#e8deee",color:"#412454"}, {back:"#eee0da",color:"#442a1e"}, {back:"#d3e5ef",color:"#183347"}, {back:"#e8deee",color:"#412454"}, ] function Today() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const {todaysTasks,todaysDoneTasks,userData} = useSelector((state)=> state.userSlice) const [showDoneTasks,setShowDoneTasks] = useState(false) const [task,setTask] = useState("") const handleAddTask = ()=>{ const newTask = {task,status:false} dispatch(addTask({_id:userData._id,newTask})).then(setTask("")) } return (

Today's Tasks

{ todaysTasks.length > 0 ? todaysTasks.map((todoTasks,index)=>{ if(!todoTasks.status){ return

{todoTasks.task}

}}) :

hehehhe

}
{setTask(e.target.value)}} value={task}>

Done Tasks

) } export default Today
